definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code

sentences.english: Yes, I have learned chest percussion .
sentences.chinese: 中譯是的，我已經學會胸部扣擊了。

sentences.english: Almost immediately, a heavy fist pounded on Langdon's door.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，蘭登的房門上傳來用拳頭扣擊的敲門聲。

sentences.english: Separate striker and spacer from vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 從車輛上拆下扣擊板和墊片。
